flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 minutes in an hour, and 60 seconds in a minute so there are 60*60 = <<60*60=3600>>3600 seconds in an hour
The device records data every 5 seconds so there will be 3600/5 = <<3600/5=702>>702 instances of data in an hour.
#### 702

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 720, not 702. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
